byline.contributor: Kabiru Anwar contributed reporting from Yola, Nigeria.

abstract: Explosion in Nigerian city of Yola kills 32 people at marketplace and wounds 80; officials suspect Boko Haram is responsible.
lead_paragraph: The blast occurred in the city of Yola on Tuesday night at a market filled with shoppers stocking up on fruit and vegetables for dinner.

headline.main: Boko Haram Is Suspected After Explosion in Nigeria Kills 32
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Is Suspected of Killing 32 in Explosion

snippet: The blast occurred in the city of Yola on Tuesday night at a market filled with shoppers stocking up on fruit and vegetables for dinner.
